thread.title: Four charges dropped in trial of Ron Paul staffers
thread.title_full: Four charges dropped in trial of Ron Paul staffers - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Four charges dropped in trial of Ron Paul staffers
text: A federal judge has dropped most of the criminal charges against two staffers from former Texas congressman Ron Paul's 2012 presidential campaign and dropped all of the charges against a third staffer. In an order Friday, Chief District Judge John Jarvey of the Southern District of Iowa tossed out four of the original indictment's counts against [â€¦] ...
